mapper.select: select ar.* from auth_role ar left join auth_user_role aur on ar.id=aur.role_id left join auth_user au on au.id=aur.user_id where au.username=#{username}
select ar.* from auth_role ar left join auth_user_role aur on ar.id=aur.role_id left join auth_user au on au.id=aur.user_id where au.id=#{userId}
